name: Bustin'!
description:
Press X to serve the ball,  L and R arrows to move your paddle. That's it!

Change the ball's angle by hitting it with your paddle in motion.

Powerups:

  • Red : 1 UP
  • Green : Sticky paddle to catch the next ball
  • Blue : Growing paddle
  • Black : Shrinking paddle that gives bonus points
  • Pink : Mega ball
  • Yellow : Multi ball
  • Rainbow : Fabulous

Beat all 20 levels! Add your name (or at least initials) to the annals of history!
